channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MD
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MD

item.title: Report X-2024051593
item.description:
Report X-2024051593

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-07T18:15:52+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-21
  • City: LAUREL
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER CALLED TO PSC FOR LEAKING PACKAGE. RESPONDER WITH FULL PPE, USED DECISION TREE AND RESPONSE SHEET. UPON ARRIVAL RESPONDER DETERMINED PACKAGE TO BE A FLAMMABLE LIQUID HAZMAT. LIQUID WAS CONFINED TO BOX. RESPONDER FOLLOWED FLAMMABLE LIQUID DECISION TREE, PLACED BOX IN SPILL TUB AND RETURNED TO DMP FOR PROCESSING.
